Package main.monster

Class Monster

java.lang.Object
main.monster.Monster
All Implemented Interfaces:
Purchasable
Direct Known Subclasses:
HeavyTank, LightTank, MassHealer, RangeDamageDealer, SingleTargetDamageDealer, SingleTargetHealer
public abstract class Monster extends Object implements Purchasable
Monster class. Represents a monster that the player can interact with.

    • getMonsterInfo

      public String getMonsterInfo()
      Gets information on a monster.
      Returns:
      A string representation of a Monster with the following format:
      monsterName (level monsterLevel)
      Type: monsterType
      Current Health: monsterHealth/monsterMaxHealth
      Attack: monsterDamage
      Heal: monsterHealAmount
      monsterDescription

    • monsterBattleStats

      public String monsterBattleStats()
      Gets monster stats. Formatted for using in GUI.
      Returns:
      A string representation of the monsters stats

    • altMonsterInfo

      public String altMonsterInfo()
      Alternative monster info that includes its buy price. Used for ShopWindow.
      Returns:
      A string representation of a Monster with the following format:
      monsterName
      Health: monsterHealth
      Attack: monsterDamage
      Heal: monsterHealAmount
      Buy Price: buyPrice

    • attack

      public void attack(Monster targetMonster)
      Attacks targetMonster, dealing amount of damage specific to the attacking monster.
      Parameters:
      targetMonster - the monster that will be attacked

    • heal

      public void heal(int healAmount)
      Heals current monster. A monster's health after a heal() cannot exceed monster's maximum health
      Parameters:
      healAmount - the amount a monster will heal

    • revive

      public void revive()
      Revives current monster.

      Parameters:

      Parameters:

    • hardDiffBoost

      public void hardDiffBoost()
      Increases the monsters stats by 1.3%. Used by opponent's monsters when player selected 'hard' difficulty.

    • addMonsterLeaveTeamChance

      public void addMonsterLeaveTeamChance()
      Increases the chance of a monster leaving by 1.

    • setBuyAndSellPrices

      public void setBuyAndSellPrices(int price)
      Description copied from interface: Purchasable
      Sets the buy and sell price of an item. The sell price is determined by the buy price.
      Specified by:
      setBuyAndSellPrices in interface Purchasable
      Parameters:
      price - how much the item costs to buy

      Parameters:

      cost - how much money it costs to buy the item
